snippet.title: ❄Sonic & Shadow Black Ice Trailer❄
snippet.description:
This is a Sonadow fangame I have been working on for a long while.  If you dislike the ship then I would not recommend on playing this game.

Despite being in a relationship with the blue blur for a while now, the ultimate lifeform wanted to show how serious he was by getting a warm winter home for the both of them to live together sometimes.

However there was a book that came with the house called The Snow Queen. They rub it off as just a fairytale which becomes their biggest mistake. Causing Shadow to be cursed and leaving Sonic behind.

Can Sonic bring his partner back from the cold once more?
💙🖤

The demo will be out on 15th August so you can get a idea on what the game is about.

Voices:
Sonic The Hedgehog:gheckl

Shadow The Hedgehog: quippy

The Snow Queen: Gakupo-ussy

Here are the links for the game:
https://f-r-a-i-l.itch.io/sonic-and-shadow-black-ice
https://gamejolt.com/games/sonic-and-shadow-black-ice/914702

If you want to find me in other places go here:
f-r-a-i-l.carrd.co
